price: 59.Diggah Nabii Qiisa yalli Abba maleh kaa gineemih ceelallo Yallih xaqul, Nabii Aadamay yalli ina maleh Abba maleh Burtak gineh ceelalloh inna kinni, tohuk lakal Yalli Seehadaytu tik kaak (Nabii Aadam kinnuk) iyyeeh edde Seehadaytu yekke.
arabic: إِنَّ مَثَلَ عِيسَىٰ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ كَمَثَلِ ءَادَمَۖ خَلَقَهُۥ مِن تُرَابٖ ثُمَّ قَالَ لَهُۥ كُن فَيَكُونُ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: inna mathala ʿīsā ʿinda al-lahi kamathali ādama khalaqahu min turābin thumma qāla lahu kun fayakūnu
